import React,{useState,useEffect} from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router"; import Constants from "../apis/Constants"; const HeaderCategory = () => { const {category}=useParams() const [categories,setCategories]=useState([]) return ( <>
    {category}
    All
    {/*
  • All
  • Electronics
  • Jewellery
  • Men's Clothing
  • Women's Clothing
    • */}
) } export default HeaderCategory
